data.text:
It's a revenge match Selection Race! 
Uooooooooooooh～～～!!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
Ever since the day I saw that expression on her 
face, as if it was a dream, Shinko Windy was enthusiastic 
and devoted herself to training.

It seemed like her immediate goal was 
to win the next Selection Race.

Since I was the one that convinced her, 
I would do what I could to support her. And that's why―

Huuu-! That was a good run! 
My throat's all dry now. ――Hm?
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
What's with this drink? 『For Windy-san』? Who's it from? 
……Well, whatever, I'll just drink it!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
Ugeh, it's really raining hard……! Can't even see 1m in front of 
me…… and here I was planning on doing some training too.
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
I wonder if the gym's open? 
But, with this weather……
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
…………Hm? 『Reserved for Shinko Windy』? 
……Why?
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
Whatever, it's fine! 
I'll go all out in the gym today!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
And that's how the days continued, 
until…… the day of the Selection Race.
Huuーー……!!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
Hm…… huh? That girl with the striped ribbon, 
I'm pretty sure she's been doing well lately……
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text: Nuoo-!!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
At the end of the last mock race, Shinko Windy was so 
distracted by her surroundings that she lost in the end.

That loss probably contributed to her anxiety and loss of self 
confidence, which led to a further decline in her concentration.

H-…… Hmph, you don't need to tell me! 
Today, Windy-chan will win!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
Selection Race, 1600m on dirt, heavy conditions in the rain. 
And now, the race begins!
data.name: Announcer

data.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
She didn't have trouble with her positioning. 
And while remaining calm, the race continued on. And then……

And they've rounded the 4th corner on to the straight! 
They're competing for the front! Shinko Windy pushes forward!
data.name: Announcer

data.text:
(Like this, I can pull ahead! 
In one go, I'll take the lead!)
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
Shinko Windy's eyes were alive. 
She was putting strength in to her legs, and then――
Do your best, just hold the lead until the goal!!
data.name: Spectator A

data.text:
They're pulling up behind you……! 
Go, do your best-!!
data.name: Spectator B

data.text: (…… No no no, I need to focus!)
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
(…… they said it clearly! That I'm talented, cool, 
and Japan's treasure! They're looking forward to my future!)
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
(That I can win…… and just now, 
that they're counting on me……!!)
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
Definitely…… I'll win, I'll win, I'll win! 
……Windy-chan will win!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text: I will wiiiiiiiin!!!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
With enough force to crush anything in her path, 
she charged through the muck and mud――
Shinko Windy won.
Haa, haa, haa, haa……!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
Aww, she was so close…… but, that first place girl was amazing! 
Shinko Windy, was it? Her intensity was no joke!
data.name: Spectator A

data.text:
Yeah, it was almost like she was a wild beast. 
I wonder when she's going to Debut? I'm looking forward to it!
data.name: Spectator B

data.text: ……Hehe, hehehe! Hehehehehehehehee!!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
How was that!? Do you get it now!? 
Windy-chan is amazing!! ……Shi shi shi!
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
After Shinko Windy's race had ended…… 
I could feel the adrenaline rushing through my veins.

The intensity of spirit that could mow everything down. And above 
all, the determination to struggle forward to grasp victory.

I wanted her to gain confidence through victory, I wanted her to 
have fun running. Up until now, that was all I wanted, but――

choices.text: But there was one thing I had missed……
choices.processed: <size=40>But there was one thing I had missed……</size>

data.text:
I had known she was talented. But that's not all. 
I was certain her growth going forward would be tremendous……!

By the time I made it to the dirt course, 
she was already surrounded by other trainers.

Eh? Scout? 
Eh? You too? For Windy-chan!?
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
Hmmmm! You guys all have good eyes on you! ……However! 
Windy-chan has already decided on her next victim――
data.name: Shinko Windy

data.text:
I wanted to sign a contract with Shinko Windy. 
I desperately waved my arms to get her attention.
